articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: Bit of me, me and me: Tim Paine slams Ben Stokes's return to ODI squad ahead of World Cup 2023 - India Today
articles.description: Former Australia Test captain Tim Paine questioned Ben Stokes's return to the ODI side ahead of the World Cup, hinting that it was a selfish move from the England all-rounder.
articles.content: Former Australia captain Tim Paine has come up with a bold take on Ben Stokes's return to ODI cricket ahead of the Cricket World Cup in India later this year, hinting that it was a selfish decision f… [+1855 chars]
